WELCOME TO THE

Association of Certified Fraud Examiners Oman Chapter (ACFE OMAN)

The OMAN ACFE Annual Conference is back, and it’s better than ever! This year, the conference will be held in person and will feature a variety of industry experts discussing topics related to fraud, investigation, and prevention.

ABOUT

Anti-Fraud Organisation

The ACFE is the world’s largest anti-fraud organisation and premier provider of anti-fraud training and education. With 90,000+ members, the ACFE is reducing business fraud world-wide and inspiring public confidence in the integrity and objectivity within the profession.

  • CORRUPTION - Giving people the skills to keep organisations safe

  • CYBER CRIME - Using the latest technology to fight threats

  • MONEY LAUNDERING - Tracing the Proceeds of Crime

Don’t miss this years in person Annual Conference on 16th November 2023.

CERTIFIED FRAUD EXAMINER

Become a CFE

A core objective of the ACFE is to provide the worldwide market with credible and competent anti-fraud professionals. The key to the ACFE’s value is a single benchmark for all, a common pool of knowledge, a common set of principles and a united body.
